title: Designing Faculty Workshops for Dental Education Curriculum Reform

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Workshop design for dental education curriculum reform and survey-based instructional improvement for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more strategies to mitigate faculty resistance during dental curriculum restructuring
Learners can derive core themes for curriculum redesign workshops by analyzing survey results
Learners can develop dental curriculum improvement plans based on instructional design principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
